events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is unacceptable.
The issue has been identified as a refund request because the customer reports receiving an incorrect item.
Support case assigned to agent Sarah T. who specializes in refunds and exchanges.
Hello! I'm Sarah and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please share your order number?
To process your refund, I need the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received.
My order number is 4587321, and I attached a photo showing the wrong product arrived instead of the item I purchased.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund confirmation. Thank you for resolving this so quickly.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear in your account.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case.
